C朗：瑞士、西班牙、荷蘭、丹麥、威爾士、匈牙利、捷克、希臘、波蘭，總計9只球隊，共17球

美斯：波黑，總計1只球隊，共1球

Mace is widely regarded as one of the greatest footballers of all time who was worth his weight in gold to his team. Don’t get me wrong- even though his prime has passed I still enjoy watching him play very much. I must say he’s made good progress with his shooting since he joined Arsenal. Unfortunately his injury has progressed fairly quickly forcing him to be sidelined with the injury for six months. He assigned the blame for his injury to a lack of training and stretching 🙆🏻‍♂️
